Text: Thanks HighCode. Just wondering, looks like 720p in the description, but below it says 1920/1080. Doesn't really matter, I can wait and see. Thanks again!

(1920/1080 @ 4000 KB/s would be bad news lol)
No problem. By the way, your 2pass encodes are always top notch!

Don't waste your time with this. The English dubbing is so poorly done, ridiculous and horrible that it's ruining this movie, which is really great btw. Get this release instead with the original Indonesian audio:
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/7489134/The.Raid.Redemption.2011.720p.BluRay.x264-SPARKS_%5BPublicHD%5D
It's also the unrated version, 1:41:04, and I played both files simultaneously fullscreen, picture quality is identical, I can't see a difference.
